item.title: 卖美国 "贸易的问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 米莱伊将在关键选举前两天会见戴蒙并与首席执行官交谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）将在摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）本周访问布宜诺斯艾利斯期间与其会面。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei will meet with Jamie Dimon during the JPMorgan Chase & Co. chief executive’s visit to Buenos Aires this week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊朗最大的银行之一在收紧标准的努力中失败了
item.description: 伊朗最大的商业贷款机构之一阿扬德银行（Ayandeh Bank）在一次国家接管中被解散，这暴露了这个因坏账和监管不力而在全球孤立的行业存在的重大缺陷。【原文：Ayandeh Bank, one of Iran’s largest commercial lenders, has been dissolved in a state take-over that’s exposed major failings in a globally isolated sector dogged by bad debts and weak regulation.】

item.title: 如果停火得以维持，以色列科技界将迎来战后初创企业热潮
item.description: 在以色列-哈马斯宣布停火后的 24 小时内，特拉维夫风险基金 Aleph 的迈克尔-艾森伯格说，他的电话响个不停。【原文：In the 24 hours after the Israel-Hamas ceasefire was announced, Michael Eisenberg of Tel Aviv-based venture fund Aleph said his phone kept ringing.】

item.title: 黑客实验室老板被控试图在俄罗斯出售机密
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件和熟悉内情的人士透露，一家出售计算机漏洞的公司的一名主管被指控窃取机密，出售给俄罗斯的一个未指明的买家。【原文：A director at a company that sells computer vulnerabilities has been charged with stealing secrets to sell to an unspecified buyer in Russia, according to a court document and people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗公牛梅奥称首席执行官的双倍奖金数额过大、时间过早
item.description: 花旗集团的长期大牛迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）说，花旗集团决定给首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）发放数百万美元的留任奖金，并增设董事长头衔，这反映出花旗集团治理不善，过早地奖励了首席执行官。【原文：Longtime Citigroup Inc. bull Mike Mayo said the bank’s decision to give CEO Jane Fraser a multimillion-dollar retention bonus and the additional title of chair reflected poor governance and prematurely rewards the chief executive.】

item.title: 随着小众企业转向主流，加密货币交易量激增 30 倍
item.description: 21shares 多年来一直在华尔街的轨道之外建立自己的加密货币专营权。早在美国允许使用比特币和以太币之前，它就在苏黎世推出了交易所交易产品，为欧洲投资者提供了使用比特币和以太币的机会。【原文：21shares spent years building its crypto franchise outside Wall Street’s orbit. From Zurich, it launched exchange-traded products that gave European investors access to Bitcoin and Ether long before the US would allow them.】

item.title: 摩根大通和美国银行称美联储准备停止资产负债表流失
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师预计，美联储本月将停止缩减其约6.6万亿美元的资产负债表，从而结束旨在从金融市场抽走流动性的进程。【原文：Strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. expect the Federal Reserve to stop shrinking its roughly $6.6 trillion balance sheet this month, bringing an end process designed to remove liquidity from financial markets.】

item.title: 法国呼吁 "灵活 "执行欧盟汽车二氧化碳排放规定
item.description: 法国表示，在欧盟寻求对新车销售实施更严格的二氧化碳排放规定时，欧盟必须保留一定程度的 "灵活性"，这是支持法国陷入困境的汽车行业的一个明确信号。【原文：France said the European Union must retain a degree of “flexibility” as the bloc seeks to implement tougher C02 emissions rules for new car sales, a clear signal in support of the country’s troubled industry.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯向华尔街提出的新要求：更少的 Neom，更多的人工智能
item.description: 2017 年，王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）与史蒂夫-施瓦茨曼（Steve Schwarzman）和孙正义（Masayoshi Son）并肩出席了沙特阿拉伯的首届年度金融峰会，共同揭幕了一座名为 "Neom "的下个世纪城市。这两位亿万富翁投资人迅速对这项耗资 5000 亿美元的计划大加赞赏，他们设想在这座大都市中，机器人的数量将超过人类，太阳能电池板的数量足以堆满中国的万里长城。【原文：In 2017, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman sat alongside Steve Schwarzman and Masayoshi Son at the first iteration of Saudi Arabia’s annual financial summit to unveil a next-century city called Neom. The two billionaire investors were quick to heap praise on the $500 billion plan that envisioned a metropolis with more robots than humans and enough solar panels to fill out the Great Wall of China.】

item.title: 众议院民主党人警告：中国新签证将抢走美国科技人才
item.description: 就在特朗普政府提高技术工人和研究生进入美国的门槛之际，中国本月早些时候推出的一项改良签证计划有可能吸引走美国的技术人才，众议院中国委员会的头号民主党人如是说。【原文：A revamped visa program launched by China earlier this month threatens to lure away American technology talent just as the Trump administration is raising barriers for skilled workers and graduate students to enter the US, the top Democrat on the House China committee said.】

item.title: OpenAI称欧洲业务在增长，即使该集团回避美国技术
item.description: OpenAI 表示，欧洲企业对其人工智能服务的需求正在增加，尽管欧洲大陆要求避开美国技术供应商的呼声日益高涨。【原文：OpenAI said corporate demand for its artificial intelligence services is increasing in Europe, despite mounting calls on the continent to avoid American technology providers.】

item.title: 熊队寻求离开芝加哥，3.56 亿美元的债务却挥之不去
item.description: 对于芝加哥来说，熊队打算放弃他们称作家已超过一个世纪的小镇，这已经够糟糕的了。【原文：For Chicago, it was bad enough that the Bears are planning to abandon the town they’ve called home for more than a century.】

item.title: 加拿大安大略省承诺出资数十亿美元建造七国集团首批小型模块化反应堆
item.description: 加拿大政府和安大略省政府正在投资 30 亿加元（21 亿美元）建造他们期望成为七国集团国家中首个小型模块化反应堆的项目。【原文：The Canadian and Ontario governments are investing C$3 billion ($2.1 billion) to build what they expect to be the first small modular reactors in a Group of Seven country.】

item.title: 巴西央行前官员称降息遥遥无期
item.description: 据经济学家和前决策者称，巴西央行可能会将期待已久的降息进一步推迟到2026年，因为该机构正在独自与通货膨胀作斗争。【原文：Brazil’s central bank could delay its long-awaited interest rate cuts further into 2026 given the institution is waging a solo fight against inflation, according to economists and former policymakers.】

item.title: 诺和诺德将最高投资者关系职位授予拥有 15 年买入评级经验的分析师
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）为其投资者关系部门找到了一位新领导，这位股票分析师在近 15 年的时间里一直建议购买该制药商的股票。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S found a new leader for its investor relations department in an equity analyst who has recommended buying shares in the drugmaker for almost 15 years.】

item.title: 英国推出紧急住房计划促进伦敦发展
item.description: 英国住房、社区和地方政府部（Ministry of Housing Communities and Local Government）已确认将采取一揽子措施，以促进伦敦在新开发项目崩溃后的住房建设。【原文：The UK’s Ministry of Housing Communities and Local Government has confirmed a package of measures designed to boost housebuilding in London following a collapse in new development.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行辞去科技公司混乱战略审查顾问一职
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）不再担任 Dye & Durham 有限公司战略董事会委员会的财务顾问，因为该委员会正在审查可能导致公司出售的事宜。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce has stepped away as financial adviser to Dye & Durham Ltd.’s strategic board committee in the middle of a review that may lead to a sale of the company.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上涨，能源行业攀升；科技行业盈利不佳拖累指数上涨
item.description: 受能源和材料公司提振，美国股市周四开盘小幅上涨。特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc）、国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp）和莫利纳医疗保健公司（Molina Healthcare Inc）等一系列公司令人失望的业绩抵消了涨幅。由于油价飙升加剧了通胀压力，10 年期国债收益率攀升也对股市造成了冲击。【原文：US stocks opened with slight gains on Thursday, boosted by energy and materials companies. Disappointing corporate results from a range of firms, including Tesla Inc., International Business Machines Corp. and Molina Healthcare Inc. offset gains. Equities were also stung by climbing yields on 10-year Treasuries as oil prices surged, adding to inflation pressure.】

item.title: 私人信贷开始牺牲保密性以吸引零售现金
item.description: 就在几年前，这对大多数私人信贷经理来说几乎是不可想象的：每月更新投资组合的价值。【原文：It would have seemed almost unthinkable for most private credit managers just a few years ago: Updating the value of their portfolios on a monthly basis.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 和 Casas Bahia 建立电子商务合作伙伴关系
item.description: 随着 MercadoLibre 公司与巴伊亚集团（Grupo Casas Bahia SA）联手推动该地区最大经济体巴西的电子商务发展，拉丁美洲数字市场的竞争进入了一个新阶段。【原文：Competition in Latin America’s digital market has entered a new phase as MercadoLibre Inc. joins forces with Grupo Casas Bahia SA to boost e-commerce in Brazil, the region’s largest economy.】

item.title: 美国现房销售创七个月最快增速
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率降低和价格涨幅趋缓，美国长期停滞不前的房地产市场出现了一些活动，上个月美国旧房销售量小幅上升。【原文：Sales of previously owned homes in the US rose modestly last month as lower mortgage rates and tamer price gains sparked some activity in the nation’s long-stagnant housing market.】

item.title: 米莱关键投票前阿根廷债券和比索反弹
item.description: 周四，阿根廷债券在六个交易日中仅第二次上涨，而比索在本周末关键的中期选举前连续第二天走强。【原文：Argentine bonds gained for only the second time in six sessions on Thursday, while the peso strengthened for a second day ahead of crucial midterm elections this weekend.】

item.title: 金银暴跌后黄金支持 ETF 买家退却
item.description: 由于担心金价涨势过快过猛，本周金价大幅下跌，黄金支持交易所交易基金的买家也随之撤退。【原文：Buyers of gold-backed exchange-traded funds retreated as bullion posted steep losses this week on concerns that the price rally had gone too fast, too far.】

item.title: 反恐精英》物品市场一夜之间下跌 17.5 亿美元
item.description: 热门电子游戏《反恐精英》（Counter—Strike）的开发商 Valve 公司发布最新消息后，该游戏的数字物品市场一夜之间下跌了 25%。【原文：The market for digital items in the popular video-game Counter—Strike fell 25% overnight, following an update by the title’s developer Valve Corp.】

item.title: 高盛推出旨在模仿私募股权投资回报的 ETF
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）与摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management is teaming up with MSCI Inc. to launch an exchange-traded fund that aims to deliver returns similar to that of a private equity portfolio.】

item.title: 阿根廷人为何在比索危机中转向加密货币？
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱伊总统在中期选举前收紧货币管制以支撑比索，像鲁本-洛佩斯这样的阿根廷人开始转向加密货币来保护自己的储蓄。【原文：As President Javier Milei tightens currency controls to prop up the peso ahead of midterm elections, Argentines like Ruben López are turning to cryptocurrencies to protect their savings.】

item.title: 超微公司预计后期交货收入将意外减少
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc., which emerged as a favorite stock among artificial intelligence-obsessed investors last year, unexpectedly issued first-quarter guidance on Thursday that fell far short of Wall Street’s expectations.】

item.title: 亚马逊在美国为犹豫不决者推出新的人工智能购物工具
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在推出一款由人工智能驱动的新工具，当购物者感到无从选择时，该工具会推荐特定的产品。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is rolling out a new AI-powered tool that will recommend a specific product when shoppers are feeling overwhelmed with options.】

item.title: 潘兴广场出售七年后到期的高等级债券
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场控股有限公司（Pershing Square Holdings Ltd.）将出售七年期美元债券，这是周四美国投资级一级市场上唯一的一次发行。【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Holdings Ltd. is selling a seven-year dollar-denominated bond, the only offering in the US investment-grade primary market on Thursday.】
